content.detailedDescription: My daughter & i were approaching the on ramp to get on i-22 at the coalburg exit. we both observed an object that was shaped like a cigar & was a very shiny silver color. it reflected the sun. it almost looked like it was mirrored. it hovered there for about 30 seconds then as we were proceeding onto the on ramp we lost it. it just disappeared & was no where in sight. this is now my 3rd ufo sighting in less than a month! (3rd sighting ever!) i am attaching a photo of a picture that i found online that looks like what i saw on the 2nd sighting.
content.summary: Silver, reflective, cigar shaped object hovering above corridor x (i-22) as i was getting on the interstate at the coalburg, al. exit.

content.detailedDescription: At my grandparents home in albuquerque, new mexico, i was looking out at the stars admiring how well you could see them. i noticed one star-like object in the sky, pulsating with blue, red, and orange light. i assumed it was an airplane. i stared at it for about ten minutes and it did not move at all. it was hovering in place probably a few hundred feet above the sandia moutains. the only other explanation was that it could have been some sort of light tower on the mountain, but i know where the towers are and it was far from them. so i have no other explanation that could disprove this object beig a ufo. it last for about 17 minutes, moved slightly lower, than abruptly disappeared. there are many videos on the internet of the same exact thing that i saw. there was also a sighting on march 27th here in albuquerque that matched my description exactly.
content.summary: Flashing/ star-like object hovering over sandia mountains, then abruptly disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my back porch when i looked up & saw a large cigar shaped object just above the trees traveling over me. i could only hear it when it was directly above me. it made a humming sound. after it passed over i could not hear it anymore. there were 2 solid white lights & 1 pulsating red light. the white lights were flush with the object (1 at each end on the bottom of the object) & the red pulsating light was in the middle on the bottom of the object. the object itself seemed to be dark but it was dark outside so i'm really not sure of the color. i stepped off my porch & followed it across the yard & watched it travel over the next 5 houses. it was traveling at a very slow speed (maybe 10-15 mph) & never changed direction. it traveled along the edge of the mountain that i live on until i could not see it anymore. the feeling i got was peaceful & curious. this is by far the strangest thing i have ever seen. this was the 2nd ufo that i have seen in 3 days. i have never witnessed any before these. both were seen at my house in brookside, al. what is going on?!?!
content.summary: Cigar shaped object traveled directly over me while i was on my back porch.

content.detailedDescription: My son & i were watching a movie in my living room when we both saw a bright light out the window that seemed to drop another light then both lights just took off so fast that we couldn't tell which way they went. the lights on these objects were unlike any i have ever witnessed on any kind of aircraft or vehicle. they were brighter than any lights i have ever seen.
content.summary: Saw bright lights out my living room window.

content.detailedDescription: I looked out my kitchen window and first observed a star-like object high in the northeastern sky around 9pm est on 4/5/2013. i continued to observe said object until around 3:30am est on 4/6/2013. during this time, the object changed shape and position several times. sometimes, it looked like there was only one light, and other times, it looked like there were 3 or 4 lights across (from my perspective). at one point, near the end of my observation, i saw one red light. i could not tell if the red light was part of the same object or was a different object that had been emitted from the first object. the first object followed a gradual path from the northeast to the east and then gradually ascended. at one point, i saw a flame shoot out from the object. the first object reached a height that was nearly straight over my house. when i looked again at 5am est, it had either disappeared or was straight over my house. i live across from lunken airport in cincinnati and am aware of the flight traffic.  i did not observe any planes landing or taking off during the night of my observation as there was a very low cloud cover, and i could not see them. i observe the skies on a nightly basis and see the usual objects, but this one was a bit different. i did get excited when i saw the red light in addition to the white and when i saw the flame.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Starlike object that changed shape and emitted flame

content.detailedDescription: Driving down 75 saw a helicopter towards the south it moved east in a nice slow move like a helicopter. then it turned west and came back. when it got closer i se it wasn't a helicopter it was a big black object it pass over my van while i was driving down the road when it was straight over me i pulled over. i got to the back of the van it was cruising north west and i had a pair of binoculars the left eye piece was broke so i used the right side, is what i used to see it. it was smooth on top and had one red light on top and a bunch of white lights underneath.
content.summary: Looked like star trek

content.detailedDescription: I came home around 9pm and observed my neighbors standing in the street pointing up to the sky.  i parked my car, looked up and saw 3 bright orange red orbs in the sky above our street but appeared to be only slightly higher than the clouds (we have had recent rain which is subsiding and there were partial clouds in the sky).  the orbs were not moving, they were perfectly still for about 30 seconds and then they slowly began moving southwest in perfect unison and in perfect equal spacing from one another.  it was quiet and peaceful but we were all in awe wondering what they could be.  they did notlook like planes at all with a very different movement and lighting presentation than the planes we see all the time. we couldn't stop talking about it all night.  i texted my friends and 3 adult children to tell them what i witnessed.  because they disappeared as they reached a cloud, we could not be sure if they disappeared going up, or because they went behind a cloud or for some other reason.
content.summary: We (neighbors too) saw 3 bright orange/red orbs standing perfectly still then slowly moved to the left in perfect unison with perfect equal spacing as they moved; they one by one disappeared beyond the clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
Coming home from a date, parked my car in a parking lot. took about 15 steps and seen this red orb come over the apartment building (3 stories) and when it came in front it stopped and backed up about 20 feet. while it backed up there was a line going up and down accross the orb. this lasted about 2 sec. and stopped and then it continued on its path going north.
just before it went over the building next to the parking lot it made a sharp 65 degree turn to the right only for a second the turn again to go in the  orininal path and went out of sight.
content.summary: It was small circular and red, moved at a slow and steady pace .

content.detailedDescription: My friend ryan and i just arrived at my hunting cabin. i was fighting with my wife on the cell phone when i happened to look up and see a bright white orb looking thing over the tree line. i told ryan to look and start recording with his cell phone. of course he choose to shine a high powered spot light at the orb. the orb stopped! made 3 shape moves turned red and vanished!At first when i saw the orb i thought it was a low flying plan but when it got close it looked like a big white glowing orb is all i can explain and describe the thing. it took a lot for me to do this but im still freaked out over the whole thing.
content.summary: A white glowing orb

content.detailedDescription:
Today 05/04/2013, i saw from my house witnes with my wife and kids
 flying  triangul object with 12 light around the edgs wich was moving throw the night sky.. after a wile the shape of edghs moves, and looks like its was   12 light balls  moving to same direction, then aprears another one.. and after 10 min apears another one with realy desorganized shape, after 1 min or less, the light the last one , come to a line and move to the down town direction..  i saw also too many chopers around the area. we leav near a militaty base . and i think they saw the lights as well . am sure this wasnt any  type of glob, object done by humans. they fly very fast and move the direction very smothly.  hope somebody else show in my area.
content.summary: Ufo lights in buenos aires, about 3 differetn groups with 12 lighs each

content.detailedDescription: A friend and myself were taking a walk around the canal path at around 10pm. we walked into cocks moors golf course and took a stroll around it. one slow moving fireball looking sphere showed up in the distance over the trees, we couldn't make out what it was but knew it was not a plane or helicopter, it was too low and too small and well just clearly wasn't. we figured someone had released a lantern into the air or something similar, as this one was slowly coming towards us another one appeared over the trees on the exact same path as the first, then another one and then a final one. they were all several meters apart from each other, all moving in the same direction all following the same path. the first reached what looked like the edge of the golf course and lowered slightly, then hovered it didn't seem to be moving at all. the the other 3 all joined it, all changing their heights and the 4 formed a perfect 4 pointed diamond like shape in the sky, all equal distance from one another, a perfect shape. they then after a couple of minutes of hovering like that started moving on the path again, still in this diamond formation, they suddenly changed direction and all together, still in shape came towards our direction, at a much quicker pace than their previous path. my friends dog had begun barking at them and wasn't happy at all, we agreed with the dog that these things were dodgy and went back onto the canal path and half kept our eye on them as we walked back from where we came. i don't know where they went after that and haven't seen them since, though have been back several times.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Glowing fireballs over cocks moors golf course. formed pattern in air.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching a video on hydrogen bomb testing and suddenly an apparition that looked like frank the pug showed up by my door. i could see it through my glass window. it gave me the chills at first, but i could feel that its presence was non-threatening. it then demanded my pizza and ate it all when a fellow being arrived and demanded more. i was left hungry for the rest of the night.
content.summary: Unable to describe

content.detailedDescription: Out on balcony, looking west, saw bright redish-orange glow, looked through binoculars looked almost like a balloon, however moving at a rapid speed nw.  other witness was my roommate.
content.summary: Glowing redish-orange object

content.detailedDescription: I had just let my dogs out in my backyard which faces the ocean; i'm about 1/4 mile from the beach.  the night was clear and the wind was calm.  my neighbor's security light usually washes out the stars, but it's been "on the fritz" so i took a moment to take in the night sky.  i immediately noticed a small but very bright red glowing object over the ocean; it appeared to hover. i immediately got my binoculars to get a better look. i was having trouble focusing with my glasses on, so i removed them and was able to see that the red "ball" seemed to have some slightly yellowish light in what appeared to be its slow direction of travel. the red portion of the object was much larger than the lighter "side" which gave me the impression of something that was more triangular than round--though the direction in which the object was moving could have skewed my perception.  no white lights were observed from the "rear".  i thought it could be some sort of emergency flare, but i've never seen one that looked like it as it remained illuminated for about two minutes and drifted slowly southward, vanishing in an instant. almost immediately, a second object--identical to the first--appeared and mirrored its actions. there was no observable launch from land or sea--no trails.  i dismissed that they were distress signals from recreational boaters (who don't piddle around at night in early april)--and the coast guard isn't known for pyrotechnics if they're performing a rescue. definitely not fireworks.  both objects simply disappeared after a total sighting time of approximately five or six minutes. i was absolutely fascinated by the whole thing and wanted to see if a third "appearance" would manifest, but it didn't happen.
content.summary: Two bright illuminated objects appeared over ocean traveling very slowly and then disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out the window towards the mountains, the first object came out of the canyon and it seemed to be a helicopter, i'm not sure what it was though because it was dark. after that object climbed away from the canyon two more objects came from the same place the first one did. a total of 6 objects were sighted coming out of the canyon. i really am not sure what it was, if it were a helicopter it would've had to of been military. as the objects went to the north they just disappear, no more lights. i just thought it was pretty weird. i saw something way different about two weeks ago and now that i found this website i will have to post it.
content.summary: Objects came out of a canyon and then climbed

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My husband saw something in the sky in the backyard. he saw lights above the neighbors shed. went outside and witnessed to orange red lights in the sky. it passed over our house, looked like a wing and when it passed it covered the stars in the background behind it. not sure what we saw, but by the time we got to the front of the house it was in the distance and disappeared. during the whole time we seen the flying object there was no sound.
content.summary: 2 red orange lights in sky no sound

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home after doctor appointment saw through my windshield a silver cylindrical saucer like almost elipse type ufo just hovering about maybe 500 feet high,up to my 1 oclock ,witnessed for about 10 seconds or so.Couldnt stop due to traffic to take a pic.I just stared at it super excited as it just hovered there.For size comparison it was the size of an m&m candy if you held it about 7 inches away from your eye.(also that kind of shape)seemed to be maybe 500 or 600 feet away,and maybe 500 feet high in the sky. it just hovered there no noticeable windows or con trails or disturbances,no noise cause i shut off my radio,it looked smooth,kind of like a  keg that was flattened with maybe 3 different sections like the middle was more outwardly pronounced and the top and bottom were slightly rounder in fact kind of like the m&m candy again..As i drove (now the craft about 2 o'clock high),i saw it move just slightly (kind of away from me and down) the distance it moved was about the same width of the craft,then it just disappeared,like it just flicked out. i drove around the rotary ahead of me,and came back to see if i can spot this again,to no avail.
  i love my daughter jenna more than life itself, and i swear on her soul i saw this craft,no mistaking it for anything else. 
  i was looking around the internet after this,and saw the videos from cnn's video of a craft in denver colorado,one of the pictures it showed loooked exactly like what i saw,only the craft i saw wasnt moving fast like thiers was,as i stated it just hovered.

 i know what i saw,but have no proof. i will never for get this

tony marcin
content.summary: Saw ufo out windshield,maybe 500 feet high,silver,saucer hovering,then moved a bit away then just disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
This is the most recent of 4 sightings in raleigh for me, but the second sighting in the past 2 weeks in which both my twin and i have witnessed. we went on a late walk around 8:30 and cut through sanderson high schools parking lot. as we were cutting through the fire alarm went off, and as we kept walking i anticipated the cops showing up. so we decided to go through the woods to avoid questioning, and we got back on the street .

we we're going up the sidewalk and we began to hear a loud motor sound, in which i immediately diagnosed as a helicopter. a few seconds later it was extremely loud so i said "that doesnt sound like a weather helicopter" and my twin agreed . we saw it flashing through the trees and it was flashing red so we waited for it to get over the treeline to see what it was . it happened so quick but basically as the helicopter came over the trees i spotted a white starlike object flying consistently in front of it . i yelled at my brother "do you see that white light ?" he said yes and we ran across the street as it went back over the trees and i could still see the helicopter flying behind this object . so not only did i get a side view, i got an angled view . i immediately called family and thought about posting on mufon, but then decided it would be tedious . i then realized if nobody ever reports these things, who knows man . i never though nc was a hotspot , but if someone could contact me i have some really good information . thanks
content.summary: Mililtary helicopter following starlike orb

content.detailedDescription: I was on my front porch around 2am and observed a light hovering by the mountains and was glowing brighter then darker. it was there for about 15 minutes and when me and my friend starting discussing it, it abruptly vanished.
content.summary: Hovered and pulsated in sky for about 15 minutes then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was out cycling at 830 pm on april 3, 2013. i was riding east when i saw a "falling star", so i stopped to look at it.  when i stopped, the object was a couple hundred feet from the earth's surface.  it then shot west flying right over me.  it was the brightest white light i have ever seen. it was silent. it had a trail behind it which resembled glitter.  the shape i could barely see was round.  i thought to myself, a "falling star" does not go east to west. i was extremely calm, the object disappeared in the west.  i knew i had seen something special.  never have seen anything like this before.  very glad i saw it!!
content.summary: I thought it was a falling star, then it stopped, then shot east to west right over me ,so bright

content.detailedDescription: It was 2:50pm at school.My teacher was reading a book for us.I realized a very bright light object shaped like rhombus.It appeared in the sky for about seconds and disappeared in the trees.
content.summary: Bright object shaped like rhombus

content.detailedDescription: Have to smoke outside. went out around 11:00 p.M. to smoke last cig. of the day. looked east toward great divide and saw a bright light in the sky. object was shaped like a cylinder and was amber colored. tried to hear any noise but there was none. object hovered in sky for a few minutes and started moving toward the south west. color was solid except for a brighter band of light in the middle of object. watched for about 10 to 15 minutes until it went behind a cloud. came inside, made sure all doors and windows locked, turned off the lights and went to bed. ( this is the second time i have observed ufo's but did not think to report the first time.  first time i observed objects there was actually 3 of them. same shape as above described.  there was one large object and 2 smaller ones. watched them for about 10 minutes.This happened in jan 2013.) because of the altitude here the sky is usually very clear.
content.summary: Sitting outside to smoke and saw bright amber colored object with no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in a lounge chair looking at the sky in my backyard. i saw a silver orb floating slowly from west to east in the sky. even though it was very high in altitude it caught my eye. at first i thought maybe it was white platic bag flying in the air. then i began to see more coming from the same direction. some where above the clouds and many where below the clouds. i would see one every five minutes going from west to east. three objects where seen at the same time and where stationary for about 20mins. these objects looked like stars, but in the daylight. it is hard to describe. they were shiny and bright and just above. imagine a star in the daylight if you can. i could not wrap mind around it. i kept thinking what can it be. it did not look like a plane (because some where stationary), or helicopter (because the altitude was way to high), or trash (because i know there is'nt that much trash in the air.I finally would lose sight of the object because it would move until i could no longer see it. it really boggled my mind. this was not the first time i have seen these objects. i really wish i knew what they are, this to me is uniquely a unidentified flying object.
content.summary: Several star-like orbs observed during the daylight hours.

content.detailedDescription:
The first thing to examine of course is the main item, which is the craft in the center of the picture.
this item is definitely rectangular in shape and it does not look like something that can fly let alone just hover in mid air. the reason i don���t think it is moving is that it appears to have a small cloud sitting in front of the end on the left.
the bottom portion, which appears to be about ��� of it is not she same color as the top section, it seems to be a very light tan or a shade of yellow. it looks to me like the bottom section is wrapped in a light cloud, ant that cloud going out to the left seems to be coming from the unit somehow.
looking carefully, the out line of the bottom is quit clear, as are the corners, and there seems to be a darker shade of tan just below the brown on what i have come to call the front, perhaps that is closer to the color of the lower section.
just above the white it looks to me like there is a row of openings running the full length of the side. it may just be that i am seeing something i want to see. i am sure you people have the tools and expertise to determine that.

directly below the cloud and towards the bottom of the picture you will notice a black dot. when that is enlarged several times you will notice it has a halo of white cloud around it in perfect proportions all around it again i am not sure that it is anything worth pointing out but i did anyhow. i would like if you could determine if it is just a speck of dirt or something to do with the main item.
going down even further, and below the vein of coal, there is a very small, elongated item that is hardly noticeable and can only be seen when the photo is expanded several times, it almost looks like a small twig; however, when it is expanded several times there appears to be that same white substance running the full length on both sides, there are several very white lines extending out a an angle on both sides. they do not extend very far and they also cross each other in pairs at the ends. they almost look like beams of light, again only speculation.
looking to the far right at about the same level as the star of the picture there is what appears to be 2 sides of a rectangle about the same color as the top of the main craft. this is so faint that one has to enlarge the photo several times to see it, and even then you have to look carefully. above that there is a white item with a black halo round it in perfect proportions, just the exact opposite to the one below the craft.
in the upper right corner you can see two l8ines that look like jet trails or meteorites falling. problem is they look like they are moving in opp0osite directions. i have enlarged them several time and i believe they are just breaks in the cloud, but it would be worth a professional checking them out.
just below the ���jet trail��� on the right you will notice a very small black dot, i thought it was just a speck of dirt, but when i enlarged it several times it looks like a piece of metal. the upper right corner is at 90 degrees. the top and right sides are very straight the bottom seems to be cut in a certain way as to fit something, the left side looks like it was straight and formed a 90 degree corner at the top; however, the left corner and part of the side appears like it has been broken off something.
i took this photo near drumheller alberta sometime in the summer of either 95 or 97, i cant remember which, it has been sitting in my junk photo drawer since the. i don���t know what all those white spots are and i am not going to speculate, but they are not on any of the other pictures on that roll of film. i don���t remember what i had for a camera at the time but you can be assured it wasn���t an expensive one. i did not take the picture because of the item in the sky, but rather, i was interested in that vein of coal you see running across the whole width of the picture.
i am not very good at guessing distances but if it will help, i was probably 30 or 40 feet from that vein of coal. the crest of the hill is probably about 23 to 30 feet beyond that, and that weeds are probably about 3 feet high. i don���t know the width of ground that i captured but i am sure you have ways of determining. because i was not aware of this craft in the sky i had no reactions toward it.
content.summary: This air craft was not seen when the picture was taken. i noticed it when sorting out some old holiday photos.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to take my dog out and looked up at the night sky and saw our local ufo acting very agigtated and angry. he was all over the sky, doing circles both horizontal and like a ferris wheel, zig zagging all over the place, up and down and  turning its light on and off at random intravels. earlier that day we had a visit by a pair of strange ufo's in daylight. the two dark ufo's passed over around 7pm just after we had finished supper at a local resteraunt. i reported this sighting on march 31, 2013, i thought it would be interesting to others about how other things besides people and animals to react to this event. i have been observing this ufo for the last 22 years and have never seen him react like this to a visit from other ones.
content.summary: Reaction of local ufo after a vist by strange ufo in daylight (two dark objects)

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside and saw a planet like object in the sky~i called several people to look at it and asked them what they thought.
there were many planes flying back and forth spraying chemtrails.
i felt excited and i ran inside and started taking pics...
i have contruction going on and my doorbell kept ringing so im not sure when i could no longer be visible~the chemtrails were very heavy so it was not too long before it was not visible.
im not very good at tech stuff so you can look at my facebook page where i posted the pics.
content.summary: I went outside that morning and when i looked at the sky i saw a planet like object~ i also observed several jets flying in front of it spraying massive amounts of chemtrails

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my car with my boyfriend in his driveway. we were just talking and i had the sudden urge to look left out of my drivers side window. when i looked i saw a huge ball of light enter the atmosphere, at first i thought it was a comet and proclaimed so, but then suddenly it imploaded and an aircraft was there instead. i freaked out and started yelling "what is that?!" this made my boyfriend want to look so we got out of my car fast and looked at it. it was at a low altitude and started to zig-zag higher and gain altitude. after it did this is flew very slowly in one direction, it had three lights on the outside of it, on one wing was a red light (i'm not sure if it was a wing but thats what i got from what i could see) in the middle it had a white light, and then on the opposite "wing" another red light. the lights would flash like this.. red, white, red......Red, white, red from left to right and disappear (like one of those arrows flashing outside of a business to try to get more customers.) the lights repeatedly did this. i'm not 100 percent positive, but from what i could see it looked triangular. we kept looking at it until it was out of sight. not even 5 minutes later i left my boyfriends house and headed home, i was about a mile away and seen the object still flying very slowly. i stopped to look at it again on the road (there was no traffic around) and i thought to myself as i was looking at it that i was going to tell people about what i had seen, right after i thought this the object made a sharp u-turn and headed right toward me. i panicked and started to drive away fastly, i couldn't keep my eyes on it because there was a lot of trees (i was on a winding, very curvy road.) i eventually arrived home and kept looking at the sky, making sure it didn't follow me, as far as i know it decided to leave me alone. when i told people about this they asked me if i took a picture of it and i didn't. the thought to take a picture didn't even cross my mind because i was awestruck.
content.summary: I saw a ball of light come into the atmosphere and impload into an aircraft.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside and saw a planet like object in the sky~i called several people to look at it and asked them what they thought.
there were many planes flying back and forth spraying chemtrails.
i felt excited and i ran inside and started taking pics...
i have contruction going on and my doorbell kept ringing so im not sure when i could no longer be visible~the chemtrails were very heavy so it was not too long before it was not visible.
im not very good at tech stuff so you can look at my facebook page where i posted the pics.
content.summary: I went outside that morning and when i looked at the sky i saw a planet like object~ i also observed several jets flying in front of it spraying massive amounts of chemtrails

content.detailedDescription:
it occurred on a very clear and cold january night.  it was a sunday night and i had plans for early in the day on monday. i worked several years on the night shift and going to bed at midnight was early since the norm was more like 4 am after work. my live in girlfriend was away visiting relatives so i was alone in the house.
      i was relaxing watching tv up till midnight, and as planned, went upstairs to go to bed. i saw an unusual light from the window and approached to see what it was.   the light was extremely bright; however, it did not bother my eyes to look directly at it. the light had the colors of a welding arc but it did not flicker. it was coming from the thick woods about 75 feet or so from the house. it cast shadows of the larger trees throughout the back yard.
       we lived way out in the woods at the edge of a pine reserve; there were no roads to our house, just kind of a path where we drove our cars from the end of the state gravel road. we lived about a quarter mile from the end of the road. with the exception of our yard, the woods around us were almost too thick to walk through. there was nothing beyond our house except the pine reserve.
       i was standing there at the window trying to figure out what this was. i thought it might be scientist doing something out there, but if so, how did they get that heavy duty lighting equipment out there? i studied the light running different ideas through my mind about what this could be but nothing made sense. i estimate it was less than three minutes since i was at the window. i decided to put my pants on and go into the back yard to get a closer look.
       before i could put any clothes on the whole room lit up with orange light coming through the windows like a flash of lightning. then immediately it was blue light doing the same from the other end of the house. in a second it all faded away to darkness. i looked through the window and everything was dark. we had no outside lighting so i decided to go to bed and check things out when the sun was up. i glanced at the alarm clock, it was 4 am. i was so disgusted with myself for staying up this late; i had plans before work tomorrow. so i went to bed to get rested for work monday night.
          monday i got up and went through my normal routines with no memory of what happened. tuesday was the same. wednesday night at work something triggered my memory. i thought to myself "oh yea! i was going to check out those woods". thursday i got a camera and entered the woods.
          i was shocked, after entering the woods about 50 feet it all opened up. the trees were bent over with their tops pointed at the ground. very few were down and i do not remember seeing any broken. i remember thinking to myself "how could these trees bend so much without breaking?��� i started taking pictures, one was very interesting, a tree that was about waste high bent over with its tip pointed at the ground and staying that way. that little limber tree should have popped back up strait as soon as whatever force let it go. 
       the site was about 60 to 80 feet wide and circular. all of the tree tops were pointed down and towards the center of the site except one tree in the center witch was untouched. this confused me, if a force was pushing down how could the tree in the center remain upright? there was no path in or out of this site, whatever this was had to come from the air.
      i looked for foreign debris or disturbed earth or tracks and found none. i am no photographer, but i tried to capture this scene in pictures, but the pictures did it no justice. later i bought a camcorder and went out there again; tragically i lost the tape since then. 
      after that i began thinking about this event trying to remember all i could. some things did not match up. for example i was looking out of the window at this light fully dressed, how could i then decide to put some pants on and go outside? i thought i was at the window less than three minutes around midnight then a minute later looked at the clock at 4 am. how could i not then know i lost 4 hours��� time? how did i forget about this event for days and then remember something happened?
      i wanted some sort of an investigation, but who do i call? some days earlier the sheriff came to our house lost and i told him the way out. during our conversation he told me if i had any trouble out here not to bother calling 911 because there were only 9 deputies in our large county and they could not respond. so calling a sheriff was out of the question, we were on our own. i did make a report to a web site for ufos back then but i did not get any response and since then forgot witch web site it was. i took the pictures to work and showed a couple of close friends. they were amazed but had no clue of what i should do. so about ten years have passed now and i think about this now and then. i have only told a few people about it. the event does not disturb me; however, i am extremely curious about what did actually happen.
content.summary: Viewed bright light in thick woods beside of the house. lost 4 hours time.

content.detailedDescription:
I often video the uae airplanes when they pass where i live as they descend to bhx airport in birmingham england. it was a fairly clear evening & i knew it would be passing overhead as id watched it on flightradar24 all the way from europe.

i got my video ready and as it flew over me i started filming it.

not until i uploaded the video to my pc did i notice the object flying at speed behind uae (united arab emirates) flight 39. there wasnt another plane visible in the area on flightradar so i am really not sure what on earth the other object is, a ufo?

i will admit to being shocked when i watched the playback once it was on my pc...

what surprised me is that due to the angle uae 39 passed overhead its speed of about 200 mph is reduced so the other object must be passing behind at great speed.

video available.
content.summary: Ufo passes a large passenger plane that is descending in the uk
